text: Kar Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazim Habakuk, God ko mɨgeir akaba, ezɨ da onger akar kamɨn mɨn zui. Gumazamiziba onger akar kabar amuva, me azir akamɨn arazimɨn gɨn mangɨ, ighiabar amu. Eghtɨ gumazir onger akabar faragha zuim gumazibav mɨkɨmtɨ, me gitabav mɨsogham.3:1 Hibrun akam deragha vezɨn kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ.
